name: Christmas lights for Tumblr avatars
description:
Decorate the avatars with Christmas lights. Ho ho ho! 
(And, Style 80518.)
additional_info: Only Firefox will blink the lights - Chrome won't animate generated content like :before and :after. 2013-11-23 Works in Chrome now, too. (Yay!) If trying out different patterns, reload the page after you Preview or Install a new pattern - otherwise, Firefox will continue to use (some of) the previous pattern. Decorate the 'new post' icons, too, with Style 80518 And Userstyles.org with style 80531
